name: Rewinding Evolution
description:
This is a game I made for the Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam. 

As a mad scientist, the player thirsts to uncover how life first began, so they use their newest invention, the Rewinder, to regress through humanity's evolutionary path until they become Primordial Goo. 

FYI: the "evolutionary path" is not very accurate

I first started playing with Unity a few weeks ago, so any feedback would definitely be appreciated!
